content: materials to make 2 bunnies you will need - 1 skein of purl soho s sweetgrass 1 65% organic cotton and 35% superfine alpaca undyed each skein of fingering-weight yarn is 437 yards/ 100 grams approximately 195 yards required per bunny - a set of five us 1½ 2 75 mm double pointed needles 2 - removable stitch markers 3 including one unique - scrap yarn - purl soho s pom pom maker set 4 small + large we used the small size with the 1-inch trim guide you will also need a sweet bunny finishing bundle 5 which includes what you need to stuff and finish 2 bunnies but not the yarn - a linen quill color card 6 in kettle black for the eyes - a linen quill color card in lychee pink for the nose and mouth - dmc embroidery floss in ecru for tying and attaching pom pom tail - poly stuffing gauge 32 stitches and 44 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size - finished circumference around widest part of body approximately 6 inches stretching up to 8 inches stuffed - finished height approximately 11 inches designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 8 all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/sweetgrass html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=23799 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/pom-pom-maker-set html 5 https //www purlsoho com/sweet-bunny-finishing-bundle html 6 https //www purlsoho com/linen-quill-color-cards html 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
